channel.title: Projectiles?
channel.description:
ive tried to add a projectile to a bow but it shoots behind me and does it like super fast?
heres a example i was useing it for a dark bow [code] createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 472, 60, 31, 0 - AttackingOn); createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 472, 40, 31, 0 - AttackingOn);[/code]

item.title: Projectiles?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

ive tried to add a projectile to a bow but it shoots behind me and does it like super fast?

heres a example
i was useing it for a dark bow

createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 472, 60, 31, 0 - AttackingOn); createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 472, 40, 31, 0 - AttackingOn);
